goodbye.title: 10 ways to say goodbye in Japanese
goodbye.explanation: This phrase is a formal and polite way to say goodbye. It is often used when parting ways for an extended period or when you may not see the person for a while.

goodbye.title: 10 ways to say goodbye in Japanese
goodbye.explanation: This phrase is a casual and friendly way to say goodbye. It is commonly used among friends, classmates, or people of similar age groups.
